thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Republicans Who Opposed Obama’s Health Law Now Work to Keep Premiums Down

author: Stephanie Armour
title: Republicans Who Opposed Obama’s Health Law Now Work to Keep Premiums Down
text:
Republicans opposed to the Affordable Care Act are showing interest in proposals to shore up the health law and lower premiums, driven partly by their concerns that escalating insurance costs may hurt them in the midterm elections.
State and federal GOP lawmakers are backing or considering reinsurance proposals that aim to curb premiums by offsetting insurers’ costlier claims. That stance is a reversal from last year, when Republicans almost uniformly opposed measures to aid the health law they tried to repeal.
...
